# 2SkyMobile - Global Telecom Connectivity Solutions

> 2SkyMobile is a full-stack telecom partner providing eSIM platforms, wholesale mobile data, billing systems, and custom software for MVNOs, resellers, and enterprises. Coverage in 190+ countries.

## Company Overview

2SkyMobile enables telecom businesses worldwide with infrastructure for mobile connectivity, eSIM provisioning, automated billing, and API integrations. Headquartered in Delaware, USA with offices in Lagos, Nigeria and Jakarta, Indonesia.

## Key Pages

- /: Homepage - Full telecom solutions overview
- /solutions: All connectivity and platform solutions
- /solutions/wholesale-mobile-data: Multi-IMSI wholesale data across 190+ countries
- /solutions/white-label-esim: Branded eSIM platform for travel, fintech, MVNOs
- /solutions/billing-platform: Operator-grade billing and revenue management
- /solutions/api-integrations: Developer APIs and SDKs
- /solutions/iot-connectivity: IoT/M2M connectivity solutions
- /solutions/custom-software: Bespoke telecom software development
- /company/about: Company mission, vision, and leadership
- /company/infrastructure: Global network infrastructure details
- /partners/program: Partner ecosystem and benefits
- /insights: Latest updates and industry insights
- /contact: Get in touch with sales and support

## Products & Services

- Wholesale Mobile Data: Multi-IMSI, multi-network coverage in 190+ countries
- White-Label eSIM Platform: Full white-label solution with custom branding
- Billing & Revenue Management: Real-time rating, invoicing, multi-currency
- IoT/M2M Connectivity: Global IoT SIMs with remote management
- Custom Telecom Software: CRM, portals, network management tools
- API Integrations & SDKs: RESTful APIs for provisioning, billing, analytics

## Technical Capabilities

- 600+ carrier networks worldwide
- 99.99% uptime SLA
- Sub-50ms average latency
- SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, GSMA SAS-SM certified
- Real-time IMSI switching and intelligent routing

## Target Customers

- MVNOs launching mobile virtual networks
- Travel companies and OTAs selling eSIM
- Fintech and digital banks adding connectivity
- IoT platforms requiring global M2M
- System integrators building telecom solutions

## Contact

- Website: https://2skymobile.com
- Sales: sales@2skymobile.com
- Support: support@2skymobile.com
- Locations: Delaware (HQ), Lagos, Jakarta
